name: storage-key
effect: Grants access to the Team Galactic warehouse in Veilstone City.
short_effect: Grants access to the Team Galactic warehouse in Veilstone City.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: The key to the storage inside the ABANDONED SHIP.
flavor_text.emerald: The key to the storage inside the ABANDONED SHIP.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A key that opens the storage hold inside the ABANDONED SHIP. It is old and looks easily broken.
